scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npx prisma generate
scripts.build:render: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy && npm run seed && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules && npm install --no-save --legacy-peer-deps && ls -la node_modules/.bin && npm run build
scripts.migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
